trans-unit.source: Represents an Active Directory role in a Windows Workflow Foundation hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função do Active Directory em um ambiente de hospedagem do Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory roles typically correspond to a job function, title, or job skill within the context of the organization.
trans-unit.target: Funções do Active Directory geralmente correspondem a uma função de trabalho, o título ou a habilidade de trabalho dentro do contexto da organização.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that report to the current role either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém todas as funções que reportam para a função atual direta ou indiretamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that either directly or indirectly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém todas as funções que reportam direta ou indiretamente para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A> returns all nodes below the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A> Retorna todos os nós abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> to return only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> para retornar somente os nós que estão diretamente abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that report directly to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém todas as funções que reportam diretamente para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that directly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém todas as funções que reportam diretamente para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> returns only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> Retorna somente os nós que são diretamente abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: To return all nodes below the current node use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar todos os nós abaixo o uso atual do nó <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the generic collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção genérica que contém todos os objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> associados à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The generic <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> collection that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> genérica associada à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A role can be a general collection of security objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma função pode ser um conjunto geral de objetos de segurança.

trans-unit.source: As such, a role can contain multiple identities, for example use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> to return all directory objects associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Dessa forma, uma função pode conter várias identidades, por exemplo usar <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> para retornar todos os objetos de diretório associados à função.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic list of the Windows NT accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista genérica das contas do Windows NT associadas à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of values that represent the Windows NT accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista genérica de valores que representam as contas do Windows NT associadas à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetIdentities%2A> obtains all <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> and converts each of them into a string value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetIdentities%2A> obtém todos os <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objetos associados a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> e converte cada um em um valor de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre o gerente da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about the manager of the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém informações sobre o gerente da função atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A> returns the direct manager for the current role.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A> Retorna o gerente direto para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: To return all roles above the current node, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar todas as funções acima do nó atual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Active Directory role that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre a cadeia gerencial associada à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém informações sobre a cadeia gerencial associada à função atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A> returns all nodes above the current role.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A> Retorna todos os nós acima da função atual.

trans-unit.source: To return just the direct manager of the current role, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar apenas o gerente direto da função atual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about all the directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre todas as operações de diretório supervisionadas pelo gerente da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about all directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contém informações sobre todas as operações de diretório supervisionadas pelo gerente da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> returned contains information from all objects managed by the manager of this role but does not contain this information from the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> retornado contém informações de todos os objetos gerenciados pelo Gerenciador dessa função, mas não contém essas informações da função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista genérica dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> associados à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista genérica dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> associados à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> checks each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> method to see if the entry has a security identifier in its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> verifica cada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> retornado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> método para verificar se a entrada possui um identificador de segurança no seu <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> has such a property, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> adds a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> to the list it returns.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> tem a propriedade, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> adiciona um <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> à lista que ele retorna.

trans-unit.source: The identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: A identidade pela qual pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contém a identidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that <paramref name="identity" /> is included in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que <paramref name="identity" /> está incluído na <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Because a role is a generalization of one or more objects, many identities may be described by a single role.
trans-unit.target: Como uma função é uma generalização de um ou mais objetos, várias identidades podem ser descritas por uma única função.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.IncludesIdentity%2A> to test that a specified identity is included within this role.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.IncludesIdentity%2A> para testar se uma identidade especificada foi incluída dentro dessa função.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da função do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the name to describe the role.
trans-unit.target: Use o nome para descrever a função.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root Active Directory node associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó do Active Directory raiz associado à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that represents the root Active Directory node associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa o nó raiz do Active Directory associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The root entry is the role up the chain of roles that has no manager.
trans-unit.target: A entrada raiz é a função a cadeia de funções que não tem gerente.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> dessa serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Popula um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)> allows this object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)> permite que esse objeto a ser serializado.
